lyric.verse: DRIVE-shitanosa osunaikoro mishirame GARAGE de HOKORI kabutta kuruma no naka, naka no ii ano koto Yukusaki wa hoshi no kanata to ka JUNGLE da to ka Kurai GARAGE HANDLE yurashi GEAR CHANGE nan kashita ne Arashi ga kita KAMINARI ga ochi hajimeru to soote ishite Kiken na michi wo hashirimeteku Futari mado wo te dekosutta Kao wa shinkan fubuki no toki wa kogoeru furishite TRIP-shita toki yoru no gaitoo mitsumete yomigaetta TRIP-shita toki yoru no gaitoo mitsumete yomigaetta TRIP-shita toki yoru no gaitoo mitsumete yomigaetta DOOR wo aketara soko wa GARAGE mishiraru GARAGE DOOR wo aketara soko wa GARAGE mishiraru GARAGE DRIVE-shitanosa osunaikoro mishirame GARAGE de HOKORI kabutta kuruma no naka, naka no ii ano koto Yukusaki wa hoshi no kanata to ka JUNGLE da to ka Kurai GARAGE HANDLE yurashi GEAR CHANGE nan kashita ne TRIP-shita toki yoru no gaitoo mitsumete yomigaetta TRIP-shita toki yoru no gaitoo mitsumete yomigaetta TRIP-shita toki yoru no gaitoo mitsumete yomigaetta Furui gaitoo mitsume yomigaetta
